book.Title: The Tassajara Bread Book
book.Note: Favorite bread book. Best way to learn to make bread, especially whole grain.

book.Title: The Best Recipe
book.Note: Favorite general cookbook. The authority on best approach or methods.

book.Title: Beer-Can Chicken
book.Note: Favorite general cookbook. The authority on best approach or methods.

book.Title: America Farm to Table
book.Note: Just getting to know this one, but great so far. Made pork roast on grill and it was great.
